attributes.action: STOP REPEALING THE ACT OF SUCCESSION JUST TO SUIT THE PRESENT PRINCE OF WALES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I BELIEVE THE LAW PREVENTING CATHOLICS FROM SUCCEADING TO THE THRONE, HAS STOOD FAIR FOR 400 YEARS, AND SHOULD NOT NOW BE CHANGED TO SUIT CURRENT PRINCE, WHO COMMITTED ADULTARY WITH A CATHOLIC.
TO CHANGE THIS LAW NOW WILL TOTALLY GO AGAINST OUR HISTORY, AND MAKE A MOCKERY OF THIS PRIME MINISTER.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
